name: Tiki Peace
text:
Special Summon this card as an Effect Monster (Rock/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 1800/DEF 1800) with the following effect (this card is also still a Trap).
‚óè (Quick Effect): You can pay 800 LP; Special Summon 1 Continuous Trap, except "Tiki Peace", from your GY or banishment as a Normal Monster (Rock/EARTH/Level 4/ATK 1000/DEF 1000) and its name becomes "Tiki Peace" (even while face-down) (that card is NOT treated as a Trap). You can only use this effect of "Tiki Peace" once per turn.
